CSSRuleType.summary:
IMPORTANT Deprecated The read-only type property of the
interface is a deprecated property that returns an integer
indicating which type of rule the represents.

remarks.para: If you need to distinguish different types of CSS rule, a good alternative is to use constructor.name:

CSSRuleType.value: The values CSSRule.UNKNOWN_RULE (0), CSSRule.CHARSET_RULE (2), CSSRule.DOCUMENT_RULE (13), CSSRule.VIEWPORT_RULE (14), and CSSRule.REGION_STYLE_RULE (16) cannot be obtained anymore.
